title: Julie's Red Velvet Cake
ingredients: ['120g butter or cooking margarine', '300g caster sugar', '2 eggs', '4 tablespoons red food colouring', '2 tablespoons cocoa powder', '225g buttermilk', '1 teaspoon salt', '300g plain flour, sifted', '1 tablespoon white vinegar', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', 'Cream cheese icing', '110g butter or margarine', '225g cream cheese', '450g icing sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
